explore.fetchDataFunction: if (!htmlContent) { console.error('No HTML content to parse'); return []; } const $ = cheerio.load(htmlContent); const sections = []; const topWeekSection = $('div#owl-slider.owl-carousel') .first() .children('div.item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.slide-caption h3 a').attr('title'), author: '', image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.slide-caption h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: [], }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: SectionTitles.TopWeek, books: topWeekSection, }); const latestSection = $('div.panel-content-homepage') .first() .children('div.content-homepage-item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right h3 a').attr('title'), author: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right span.item-author').text(), image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: $(element) .find('p.item-chapter') .map((chapIndex, chapElement) => { return { title: $(chapElement).find('a').text(), url: $(chapElement).find('a').attr('href'), date: null, pages: [], }; }) .get(), }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: SectionTitles.NewReleases, books: latestSection, }); const newMangasSection = $('div.panel-newest-content') .first() .children('a') .map((index, element) => { return { title: '', author: '', image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).attr('href'), description: '', chapters: [], }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: SectionTitles.Trending, books: newMangasSection, }); return sections;

search.fetchDataFunction: if (!htmlContent) { console.error('No HTML content to parse'); return []; } const $ = cheerio.load(htmlContent); const books = []; const results = $('div.panel-search-story') .children('div.search-story-item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.item-right h3 a').text(), author: $(element).find('div.item-right span.item-author').text(), image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.item-right h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: $(element) .find('div.search-story-item div.item-right a.item-chapter') .map((chapIndex, chapElement) => { return { title: $(chapElement).text(), url: $(chapElement).attr('href'), date: null, pages: [], }; }) .get(), }; }) .get(); books.push(...results); return books;

book.fetchDataFunction: if (!htmlContent) { console.error('No HTML content to parse'); return {}; } const $ = cheerio.load(htmlContent); const book = {}; const mainElement = $('div.container-main-left'); book.title = $(mainElement).find('div.panel-story-info div.story-info-right h1').text(); book.author = $(mainElement) .find('div.panel-story-info div.story-info-right i.info-author') .parent() .parent() .find('td.table-value a') .text(); book.image = $(mainElement).find('div.panel-story-info div.story-info-left span.info-image img').attr('src') ?? ''; book.url = ''; book.description = ''; // book chapters book.chapters = $(mainElement) .find('div.panel-story-chapter-list ul') .children('li') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('a').text(), url: $(element).find('a').attr('href'), date: new Date($(element).find('span.chapter-time').attr('title')), pages: [], }; }) .get(); return book;

chapter.fetchDataFunction: if (!htmlContent) { console.error('No HTML content to parse'); return {}; } const $ = cheerio.load(htmlContent); const chapter = {}; const images = $('.container-chapter-reader').children('img'); images.map((index, element) => { chapter.pages.push($(element).attr('src')); }); return chapter;
